meanings.sent1: The book contained many mythological stories.
meanings.sent2: The students studied various mythological creatures in class.
meanings.sent3: The children enjoyed creating their own mythological tales.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination was as vast as the mythological universe.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed ancient artifacts with mythological significance.

meanings.definition: Existing only in myth or legend.
meanings.sent1: The treasure was hidden in a mythological cave.
meanings.sent2: Legends speak of a mythological city lost in time.
meanings.sent3: The old map led them on a mythological treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: The knight set out on a quest to find the mythological sword.
meanings.sent5: The mythological creature guarded the enchanted forest.
